description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Let the creativity flow! Pixel Animator 3D is a modelling and animation suite for your XBox360! Use boxes to build your props and actors, and make whatever scene or story you want. The easy to use model editor lets you quickly make models, or use premade models and avatars to build your scenes.
description.short: Let the creativity flow! Pixel Animator 3D is a modelling and animation suite for your XBox360! Use boxes to build your props and actors, and make whatever scene or story you want. The easy to use model editor lets you quickly make models, or use premade models and avatars to build your scenes.
